page.title: 17A Dentist in Sutton on Sea.
page.content: The dentist in Sutton on Sea is{Mr {M.Carlisle.}He has worked here for 10 years. He moved from Kings Lynn in Norfolk before which he lived in Liverpool where he trained to be a dentist.He lives in Sandilands and has a practice in Park Rd East. He sees about 40-50 people a day. He does not think the dentist's job has changed much although instruments are more modern. Patients seem to dread the syringe most but they are usually very good. He also has a surgery in{Alford. In the surgery in Sutton there is a big chair which leans back and has drawers where he puts his instruments. There is a bowl by the chair where the patients rinse their mouths. The flat above is rented out to holidaymakers but our headmaster{Mr Jones}lives there at the moment.{Mrs Carlisle sometimes works in the surgery.
